title: ATTENTION RENTER! FIRST TIME HOME BUYER CAN BUY WITH $3000-$4000 DOWN!
posting_body: ['BREAK AWAY FROM THE RENTING CYCLE!!!', 'YOU CAN TAKE ADVANTAGE OF FIRST TIME HOME BUYER PROGRAM WITH $3000-$4000 DOWN!!!', 'You can go with as little as 1.0%-1.5% as your down payment where the government will assist you with the rest.', 'Let me walk you through the process of owning your own home.', 'I am the Realtor that specialize with first time home buyer program.', 'I will walk you through the entire process.', 'I have a team of lender that are certified to process all type of government programs.', 'For exceptional service, please call', 'show contact info', 'The consultation is free.', 'John Khaw', 'Realtor', 'show contact info', 'Nationwide Real Estate Executives', '6850 Lincoln Ave Suite 200', 'Buena Park, Ca 90620', '(specializing in Los Angeles County, Orange County, San Bernardino County and Riverside County)', 'Picture is for illustration purposes.', 'Actual home meets first time home buyer program']
